value.title: Times Technology Went Straight Up Evil
value.excerpt: Technology is meant to make our lives easier, and most of the time it does. But there have been instances when technology doesn't go as planned.

value.title: New robotics hub opens in West Cumbria
value.excerpt: A new facility in Whitehaven is the first of network of robotics and artificial intelligence collaboration hubs across the UK.

value.title: Legal-Tech: Artificial Intelligence and Robotics in the Legal Space
value.excerpt: Legal technology services, artificial intelligence and robotics are on the rise and expected to be in even higher demand in the coming years

value.title: Get Ready For The Industrial Intelligence Revolution
value.excerpt: Industry 4.0 is bringing disruptive changes, converting industrial spaces to smart, connected and intelligent environments. Manufacturing has been irreversibly changed.

value.title: How The Digital Ecosystem Improves Engagement Across The Manufacturing Value Chain
value.excerpt: Digital transformation is disrupting all industries globally and has accelerated over the last two years during the pandemic. The Industry 4.0 market, currently estimated at $116 billion, is expected to grow at a CAGR of 16.

value.title: Acme to offer 3D Intelligent Vision-Guided Robots for manufacturing and warehousing sectors
value.excerpt: Can be used for vision-guided depalletizing, order picking, gluing, mixed palletizing, rebar marking, logistics parcel picking and assembling activities in manufacturing and logistic warehousing facil

value.title: KT launches AI quarantine robot
value.excerpt: KT has launched an artificial intelligence (AI) quarantine robot intended for use at hospitals and other large facilities receiving many visitors. With quarantine robots being just the start of things to come,

value.title: Sarcos merges with RE2, aims to have robots take on dangerous jobs
value.excerpt: Sarcos and RE2 grew up working on defense projects but they’re now aiming to expand and take on industrial roles. They’re particularly interested in supporting and maybe replacing humans working unstructured spaces where complete automation is difficult.

value.title: Lisa Smith chose to go to area controlled by ‘demonic’ terrorist group, court told
value.excerpt: Lisa Smith, a former soldier who denies membership of Isis, chose to travel to an area controlled by the “demonic” terrorist organisation having rejected peace and integration to embrace what is militant and violent,

value.title: Artificial intelligence really isn’t all that intelligent
value.excerpt: Narrow AI applications such as Google Search and Amazon Alexa are great at solving specific problems, but only as long as you stick to the script.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) in construction
value.excerpt: With the explosion of terms like Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) in construction, AEC Magazine caught up with Senthil Kumar, CTO and head of AI at start-up Slate.ai to discuss how the technology can assist the complexity in the building industry Q: Senthil,

value.title: At Pompeii, A Robot Dog Is Helping Guard And Protect The Ruins
value.excerpt: A quadruped robot named Spot is the latest piece of cutting-edge technology to come into service at Italy’s Archeological Park of Pompeii in a bid to protect the ancient site.

value.title: STEM programs launch at the county library for Robotics Month
value.excerpt: Did you know that April is Robotics Month? Jeff Buydos, from the county library, joined us on the show to share what kind of programs are offered. Kids can learn all about engineering, robotics,

value.title: You’ll be injecting robots into your bloodstream to fight disease soon
value.excerpt: The last shot you'll ever need. What if we could create super-powered micro-bots that lived to destroy diseases? What if we already did?

value.title: Atom Limbs raises $4M for 'mind-controlled' prosthetics with sensory feedback
value.excerpt: The San Carlos startup is developing its first product, an above-the-elbow arm with sensory feedback and fully functional fingers.

value.title: Education minister praises tech innovations as he meets robots
value.excerpt: Education Minister Prodromos Prodromou highlighted the importance of digital skills on Monday during his visit to the digitally supported learning environment at the pedagogical institute. The minister had the opportunity to meet and interact with humanoid robots NAO and PEPPER and learn about the robotics kits,

value.title: Microsoft’s Dynamics 365 creates peace of mind for business
value.excerpt: Wide-ranging benefits range from modernising sales and customer service to creating intelligent supply chain operations and e-commerce platforms

value.excerpt: Recently, the leading surgical robotic and AI customerized industrial Internet company - Weiyun AI&Robotics Group has successfully developed AI SMILE Orthodontic Smart Alignment System named Venus 1.0,

value.title: China’s latest brainwave? Controlling space robots using mind power
value.excerpt: A device that can be controlled by a user’s brain has achieved unprecedented accuracy in tests and could be used at the Chinese space station, scientists say.

value.title: Sandia Researcher Starts Muslim Community Robotics Team
value.excerpt: A research scientist at Sandia National Laboratories, who started the nonprofit Itkan Institute of Technology, has formed four student-led robotics teams in North Texas in hopes of encouraging interest in STEM.

value.title: China’s latest brainwave? Controlling space robots using mind power
value.excerpt: A research team with China’s manned space programme say they have developed technology that will allow astronauts to control robotic equipment ... and Chen Dong used a mind-reading device ...

value.title: IIT-Mandi to organise Robotics & AI summer camp for school kids
value.excerpt: The Indian Institute of Technology Mandi is organising the summer camp on Robotics and Artificial Intelligence (AI) in collaboration with Himachal Pradesh Kaushal Vikas Nigam (HPKVN), Shimla. This summer camp,

value.title: This Cheetah Robot Taught Itself How to Sprint in a Weird Way
value.excerpt: Researchers got the machine to run nearly 13 feet per second. It ain't graceful, but this powerful technique is preparing robots for the chaos of the world.

value.title: Artificial intelligence and robotics uncover hidden signatures of Parkinson's disease
value.excerpt: A study published today in Nature Communications unveils a new platform for discovering cellular signatures of disease that integrates robotic systems for studying patient cells with artificial intelligence methods for image analysis.

value.title: South Africa to Add Robotics & Coding to School Curriculum
value.excerpt: The Department of Basic Education (DBE) announced that it will be adding robotics and coding to the South African curriculum. According to the annual performance plan 2022/2023 which was released by the department recently,

value.title: Bear Robotics Raises $81M in Series B Funding
value.excerpt: Bear Robotics, a Redwood City, CA-based provider of hospitality robotics and artificial intelligence solutions, raised $81M in Series B funding

value.title: Top AI execs, including Richard Socher, launch AIX Ventures
value.excerpt: Richard Socher, former Salesforce chief scientist, is among the founding partners of AIX Ventures, a new $50 million AI venture fund.

value.title: Survey: confidence in intelligent robots for warehouse automation at all-time high
